attributes.action: To take charge of the London 2012 Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo chosen by the London 2012 Olympic Committee is not even worthy of being sprayed as graffiti on the side of a tube train destined for the Olympic site.  The Prime Minister should intervene and restore some credibility to the event, which will ultimately cost the taxpayer dearly, unless he is willing to suffer being the laughing stock of the world sporting community

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
